preface.title: Preface
preface.para: The Spring Data Solr project applies core Spring concepts to the development of solutions using the Apache Solr Search Engine. We provide a "template" as a high-level abstraction for storing and querying documents. You will notice similarities to the mongodb support in the Spring Framework.

section.title: Requirements
section.para:
Requires Apache Solr 3.5 and above or optional dependency <dependency> <groupId>org.apache.solr</groupId> <artifactId>solr-core</artifactId> <version>${solr.version}</version> </dependency>
If you tend to use the Embedded Version of Solr Server 4.x you will also have to add a version of servlet-api and check your <lockType> as well as <unlockOnStartup> settings.
